application.UI

Class DisplayText

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.UI.DisplayText

  • public class DisplayText
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for the text on the scene. This includes the volume HUD, Pause HUD, Artist, Title, and more!
    Author:
    Spud

      • checkTextSpacing

        public static void checkTextSpacing(javafx.scene.text.Text text,
                                    javafx.scene.text.FontWeight weight,
                                    double fontSize)
        Adjusts the text size based on how long it is.
        Parameters:
        text - - The text to be changed.
        weight - - The font weight of the text.
        fontSize - - The original font size.
